title: Polly Gets Out
description: Polly the parrot gets out of her cage. She flies all over the neighborhood and sees many new things. Will she ever find her way back home? Supportive pictures, repetitive phrases, and high-frequency words make this book easy for early readers.
meta: cage, children, flew, path, playground, safe
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Pronouns : Recognize and understand the use of pronouns
Position Words : Recognize, understand, and use position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
